[Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of Casalis, Eugene's Biographical Notice on the life, conversation and death of Manoah, member of the Church of the Thaba-Bossiu, among the Bechuanas-Bassoutos (South Africa), 1843. Translated by Morelli, Ettore. Unpublished transcript sourced from the Bibliotheque Nationale de France, translation prepared for the Archive and Public Culture research initiative, 2020 [1843].]
